alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Madison; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 12:29PM EDT until June 12 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Northwestern Taylor County in Big Bend of Florida... Southwestern Madison County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 115 PM EDT. * At 1229 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles northeast of Woodville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cody, Goose Pasture, Lamont, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs, Eridu, Cabbage Grove and Thomas City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
